verses.verse: וַיּוֹלִכֵ֖נִי <WH1980> led אֶל־ <WH413> to הַשָּׁ֑עַר <WH8179> me to the gate שַׁ֕עַר <WH8179> [even] the gate אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after פֹּנֶ֖ה <WH6437> that looketh דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> toward הַקָּדִֽים׃ <WH6921> the east

וְהִנֵּ֗ה <WH2009> and behold כְּבוֹד֙ <WH3519> And behold the glory אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בָּ֖א <WH935> came מִדֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> from the way הַקָּדִ֑ים <WH6921> of the east וְקוֹל֗וֹ <WH6963> and his voice כְּקוֹל֙ <WH6963> [was] like a noise מַ֣יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> of many וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> and the earth הֵאִ֥ירָה <WH215> shined מִכְּבֹדֽוֹ׃ <WH3519> with his glory

וּכְמַרְאֵ֨ה <WH4758> And [it was] according to the appearance הַמַּרְאֶ֜ה <WH4758> of the vision אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which רָאִ֗יתִי <WH7200> which I saw כַּמַּרְאֶ֤ה <WH4758> [even] according to the vision אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7200> that I saw בְּבֹאִי֙ <WH935> when I came לְשַׁחֵ֣ת <WH7843> to destroy אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> the city וּמַרְא֕וֹת <WH4758> [were] like the vision כַּמַּרְאֶ֕ה <WH4758> of the vision אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which רָאִ֖יתִי <WH7200> that I saw אֶל־ <WH413> by נְהַר־ <WH5104> by the river כְּבָ֑ר <WH3529> Chebar וָאֶפֹּ֖ל <WH5307> and I fell אֶל־ <WH413> on פָּנָֽי׃ <WH6440> upon my face

וּכְב֥וֹד <WH3519> And the glory יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בָּ֣א <WH935> came אֶל־ <WH413> into הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> into the house דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way שַׁ֔עַר <WH8179> of the gate אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> whose prospect דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> [is] toward הַקָּדִֽים׃ <WH6921> the east

וַתִּשָּׂאֵ֣נִי <WH5375> took me up ר֔וּחַ <WH7307> So the spirit וַתְּבִיאֵ֕נִי <WH935> and brought אֶל־ <WH413> about הֶֽחָצֵ֖ר <WH2691> court הַפְּנִימִ֑י <WH6442> me into the inner וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> and behold מָלֵ֥א <WH4390> filled כְבוֹד־ <WH3519> and behold the glory יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> the house

וָאֶשְׁמַ֛ע <WH8085> And I heard מִדַּבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> [him] speaking אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to me מֵהַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> unto me out of the house וְאִ֕ישׁ <WH376> and the man הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become עֹמֵ֖ד <WH5975> stood אֶצְלִֽי׃ <WH681> by me

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me בֶּן־ <WH1121> unto me Son אָדָם֙ <WH120> of man אֶת־ <WH853> מְק֣וֹם <WH4725> the place כִּסְאִ֗י <WH3678> of my throne וְאֶת־ <WH853> מְקוֹם֙ <WH4725> and the place כַּפּ֣וֹת <WH3709> of the soles רַגְלַ֔י <WH7272> of my feet אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> I אֶשְׁכָּן־ <WH7931> where I will dwell שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> in it בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> for ever וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יְטַמְּא֣וּ <WH2930> no more defile ע֣וֹד <WH5750> again בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> shall the house יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> of Israel שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name קָדְשִׁ֞י <WH6944> and my holy הֵ֤מָּה <WH1992> like וּמַלְכֵיהֶם֙ <WH4428> [neither] they nor their kings בִּזְנוּתָ֔ם <WH2184> by their whoredom וּבְפִגְרֵ֥י <WH6297> nor by the carcases מַלְכֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4428> of their kings בָּמוֹתָֽם׃ <WH1116> in their high places

בְּתִתָּ֨ם <WH5414> In their setting סִפָּ֜ם <WH5592> of their threshold אֶת־ <WH853> סִפִּ֗י <WH5592> by my thresholds וּמְזֽוּזָתָם֙ <WH4201> and their post אֵ֣צֶל <WH681> by מְזוּזָתִ֔י <WH4201> my posts וְהַקִּ֖יר <WH7023> and the wall בֵּינִ֣י <WH996> between וּבֵֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <WH996> between וְטִמְּא֣וּ ׀ <WH2930> between me and them they have even defiled אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name קָדְשִׁ֗י <WH6944> my holy בְּתֽוֹעֲבוֹתָם֙ <WH8441> by their abominations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> that they have committed וָאֲכַ֥ל <WH398> burn up אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בְּאַפִּֽי׃ <WH639> them in mine anger

עַתָּ֞ה <WH6258> Now יְרַחֲק֧וּ <WH7368> far אֶת־ <WH853> זְנוּתָ֛ם <WH2184> their whoredom וּפִגְרֵ֥י <WH6297> and the carcases מַלְכֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4428> of their kings מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> and I וְשָׁכַנְתִּ֥י <WH7931> from me and I will dwell בְתוֹכָ֖ם <WH8432> in the midst לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> of them for ever ס

אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you בֶן־ <WH1121> Thou son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man הַגֵּ֤ד <WH5046> shew אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> to the house וְיִכָּלְמ֖וּ <WH3637> that they may be ashamed מֵעֲוֹנֽוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5771> of their iniquities וּמָדְד֖וּ <WH4058> and let them measure אֶת־ <WH853> תָּכְנִֽית׃ <WH8508> the pattern

וְאִֽם־ <WH518> If נִכְלְמ֞וּ <WH3637> And if they be ashamed מִכֹּ֣ל <WH3605> of all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> they עָשׂ֗וּ <WH6213> of all that they have done צוּרַ֣ת <WH6699> them the form הַבַּ֡יִת <WH1004> of the house וּתְכוּנָת֡וֹ <WH8498> and the fashion וּמוֹצָאָ֡יו <WH4161> thereof and the goings out וּמוֹבָאָ֣יו <WH4126> thereof and the comings וְֽכָל־ <WH3605> all צֽוּרֹתָ֡ו <WH6699> in thereof and all the forms וְאֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֻקֹּתָיו֩ <WH2708> thereof and all the ordinances וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all [צוּרֹתָי כ] (צ֨וּרֹתָ֤יו <WH6699> design ק) וְכָל־ <WH3605> whole [תֹּורֹתֹו כ] (תֹּורֹתָיו֙ <WH8451> bullock ק) הוֹדַ֣ע <WH3045> shew אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> וּכְתֹ֖ב <WH3789> thereof and write לְעֵֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5869> [it] in their sight וְיִשְׁמְר֞וּ <WH8104> that they may keep אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all צוּרָת֛וֹ <WH6699> thereof and all the forms וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> of all חֻקֹּתָ֖יו <WH2708> thereof and all the ordinances וְעָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> thereof and do אוֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

זֹ֖את <WH2063> likewise תּוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> This [is] the law הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> of the house עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> Upon the top הָ֠הָר <WH2022> of the mountain כָּל־ <WH3605> entire גְּבֻל֞וֹ <WH1366> the whole limit סָבִ֤יב ׀ <WH5439> thereof round about סָבִיב֙ <WH5439> around קֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> [shall be] most קָדָשִׁ֔ים <WH6944> holy הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold זֹ֖את <WH2063> likewise תּוֹרַ֥ת <WH8451> Behold this [is] the law הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> of the house

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <WH428> and these מִדּ֤וֹת <WH4060> And these [are] the measures הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> of the altar בָּֽאַמּ֔וֹת <WH520> after the cubits אַמָּ֥ה <WH520> The cubit אַמָּ֖ה <WH520> [is] a cubit וָטֹ֑פַח <WH2948> and an hand breadth וְחֵ֨יק <WH2436> even the bottom הָאַמָּ֜ה <WH520> [shall be] a cubit וְאַמָּה־ <WH520> a cubit רֹ֗חַב <WH7341> and the breadth וּגְבוּלָ֨הּ <WH1366> and the border אֶל־ <WH413> on שְׂפָתָ֤הּ <WH8193> thereof by the edge סָבִיב֙ <WH5439> thereof round about זֶ֣רֶת <WH2239> span הָאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> [shall be] a וְזֶ֖ה <WH2088> and this גַּ֥ב <WH1354> and this [shall be] the higher place הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> of the altar

וּמֵחֵ֨יק <WH2436> And from the bottom הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> [upon] the ground עַד־ <WH5704> against הָעֲזָרָ֤ה <WH5835> settle הַתַּחְתּוֹנָה֙ <WH8481> [even] to the lower שְׁתַּ֣יִם <WH8147> [shall be] two אַמּ֔וֹת <WH520> cubits וְרֹ֖חַב <WH7341> and the breadth אַמָּ֣ה <WH520> cubit אֶחָ֑ת <WH259> one וּמֵהֳעֲזָרָ֨ה <WH5835> settle הַקְּטַנָּ֜ה <WH6996> and from the lesser עַד־ <WH5704> against הָעֲזָרָ֤ה <WH5835> settle הַגְּדוֹלָה֙ <WH1419> [even] to the greater אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> [shall be] four אַמּ֔וֹת <WH520> cubits וְרֹ֖חַב <WH7341> and the breadth הָאַמָּֽה׃ <WH520> [one] cubit

וְהַֽהַרְאֵ֖ל <WH741> and from the altar אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> [shall be] four אַמּ֑וֹת <WH520> cubits [וּמֵהָאֲרִאֵיל כ] (וּמֵהָאֲרִיאֵ֣ל <WH741> the altar ק) וּלְמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> and upward הַקְּרָנ֖וֹת <WH7161> horns אַרְבַּֽע׃ <WH702> [shall be] four

[וְהָאֲרִאֵיל כ] (וְהָאֲרִיאֵ֗ל <WH741> altar ק) שְׁתֵּ֤ים <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <WH6240> ten אֹ֔רֶךְ <WH753> [cubits] long בִּשְׁתֵּ֥ים <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> ten רֹ֑חַב <WH7341> broad רָב֕וּעַ <WH7251> square אֶ֖ל <WH413> in אַרְבַּ֥עַת <WH702> in the four רְבָעָֽיו׃ <WH7253> squares

וְהָעֲזָרָ֞ה <WH5835> And the settle אַרְבַּ֧ע <WH702> in the four עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> teen אֹ֗רֶךְ <WH753> [cubits] long בְּאַרְבַּ֤ע <WH702> four עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <WH6240> teen רֹ֔חַב <WH7341> broad אֶ֖ל <WH413> in אַרְבַּ֣עַת <WH702> four רְבָעֶ֑יהָ <WH7253> squares וְהַגְּבוּל <WH1366> thereof and the border סָבִ֨יב <WH5439> about אוֹתָ֜הּ <WH853> חֲצִ֣י <WH2677> it [shall be] half הָאַמָּ֗ה <WH520> a cubit וְהַֽחֵיק־ <WH2436> and the bottom לָ֤הּ אַמָּה֙ <WH520> thereof [shall be] a cubit סָבִ֔יב <WH5439> about וּמַעֲלֹתֵ֖הוּ <WH4609> and his stairs פְּנ֥וֹת <WH6437> shall look קָדִֽים׃ <WH6921> toward the east

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me בֶּן־ <WH1121> unto me Son אָדָם֙ <WH120> of man כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> These חֻקּ֣וֹת <WH2708> These [are] the ordinances הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> of the altar בְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> in the day הֵעָֽשׂוֹת֑וֹ <WH6213> when they shall make לְהַעֲל֤וֹת <WH5927> it to offer עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> and עוֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> burnt offerings וְלִזְרֹ֥ק <WH2236> thereon and to sprinkle עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and דָּֽם׃ <WH1818> blood

וְנָתַתָּ֣ה <WH5414> And thou shalt give אֶל־ <WH413> about הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> to the priests הַלְוִיִּ֡ם <WH3881> the Levites אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who הֵם֩ <WH1992> are from מִזֶּ֨רַע <WH2233> that be of the seed צָד֜וֹק <WH6659> of Zadok הַקְּרֹבִ֣ים <WH7138> which approach אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me נְאֻ֛ם <WH5002> unto me saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <WH3068> GOD לְשָֽׁרְתֵ֑נִי <WH8334> unto me to minister פַּ֥ר <WH6499> bullock בֶּן־ <WH1121> A young בָּקָ֖ר <WH1241> bull לְחַטָּֽאת׃ <WH2403> for a sin offering

וְלָקַחְתָּ֣ <WH3947> And thou shalt take מִדָּמ֗וֹ <WH1818> of the blood וְנָ֨תַתָּ֜ה <WH5414> thereof and put עַל־ <WH5921> and אַרְבַּ֤ע <WH702> [it] on the four קַרְנֹתָיו֙ <WH7161> horns וְאֶל־ <WH413> and on אַרְבַּע֙ <WH702> of it and on the four פִּנּ֣וֹת <WH6438> corners הָעֲזָרָ֔ה <WH5835> of the settle וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> and on הַגְּב֖וּל <WH1366> and upon the border סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> round about וְחִטֵּאתָ֥ <WH2398> thus shalt thou cleanse אוֹת֖וֹ <WH853> וְכִפַּרְתָּֽהוּ׃ <WH3722> and purge

וְלָ֣קַחְתָּ֔ <WH3947> Thou shalt take אֵ֖ת <WH853> הַפָּ֣ר <WH6499> the bullock הַֽחַטָּ֑את <WH2403> also of the sin offering וּשְׂרָפוֹ֙ <WH8313> and he shall burn בְּמִפְקַ֣ד <WH4662> it in the appointed place הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> of the house מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> without לַמִּקְדָּֽשׁ׃ <WH4720> the sanctuary

וּבַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> day הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> And on the second תַּקְרִ֛יב <WH7126> thou shalt offer שְׂעִיר־ <WH8163> a kid עִזִּ֥ים <WH5795> of the goats תָּמִ֖ים <WH8549> without blemish לְחַטָּ֑את <WH2403> for a sin offering וְחִטְּאוּ֙ <WH2398> and they shall cleanse אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> the altar כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> as they חִטְּא֖וּ <WH2398> as they did cleanse בַּפָּֽר׃ <WH6499> [it] with the bullock
